title: What is the best e-learning site or online university to quickly finish a bachelor’s degree? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you don’t care, then you pay a diploma mill and you’ll have your degree as soon as they get the cash. It won’t have any value, employers won’t respect it, but you’ll have a diploma (worthless). If you actually care about the degree you’re earning, then look at brick and mortar colleges and universities that are regionally accredited and that offer online programs and courses. UMass Amherst does better online with its graduate programs, but they do have an undergraduate program called “University Without Walls” (UWW). It doesn’t earn the same respect as the regular campus-based programs, but if you need the flexibility and want to try to get academic credit for “life experience”, then UWW is the program for you. You can learn more about it on their website (or simply google University of Massachusetts Amherst University Without Walls and then click on the links to read more).

Is you are in the USA I always recommend Western Governor's University. It is an accredited (regionally accreditation) school, fully online. You determine how fast you go, taking one class at a time, you can test out, if you have the skills, and can accelerate (take extra classes).
